job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
This individual will work to monitor system health, investigate and troubleshoot delivery failures and/or related production issues, escalate issues as needed and take part in an on-call rotation (roughly every 5-6 weeks). The main focus of this role will be to monitor batch and real-time processing and support overall production support activity as well as aid in the automation of manual tasks.
• 3-5 years of operations experience with large-scale, high-availability distributed systems
• Application/Platform production support experience
• SQL/Oracle and UNIX functional proficiency
• An understanding of programming – java, javascript, web development, etc.
• On-call support experience with a critical platform
• Familiarity with Batch/Scheduled job execution and troubleshooting
• File Transfer Protocol (FTP) experience
• Scripting and automation experience
• Healthcare EDI/ANSI/X12 industry knowledge
• Splunk, New Relic, Solar Winds or other enterprise monitoring tool experience
